recipes.recipeText:
Prep time: 10 min
Cook time: 15 min
Serves: 2–3

Ingredients

200 g plant-based minced meat

1 small onion, finely chopped

1 clove garlic, minced

1 tbsp tomato paste

1 tsp smoked paprika

1 tsp cumin

½ tsp chili powder (optional)

Salt & pepper to taste

1 tbsp oil

6 small taco shells or tortillas

Toppings (choose your favorites):

Diced tomato

Shredded lettuce

Avocado or guacamole

Corn

Vegan yogurt or sour cream

Fresh cilantro or parsley

Instructions

Heat oil in a pan over medium heat.

Add onion and garlic, cook for 2–3 minutes until soft.

Add plant-based mince and cook until browned (about 5–7 minutes).

Stir in tomato paste and spices. Add a splash of water if it’s too dry.

Warm the taco shells in a dry pan or oven.

Assemble: Fill each taco with the vegan mince mixture and your favorite toppings.
